name: Time Machine
body:
### Welcome to Time Machine.
## THIS WEBSITE IS NOT PART OF OUR SUBMISSION! IT IS JUST FOR USERS TO DOWNLOAD THE APP, AND SHOULD NOT BE JUDGED! GO TO OUR CODE URL TO SEE OUR WORK, OR FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS TO DOWNLOAD OUR APP BELOW.

Time Machine allows the user to become a time traveler from the comfort of their modern smartphone. We do all the hard work, grabbing data from reliable government APIs in order to historically display the history of the area in a beautiful format that is easy to understand and enjoy. Time Machine was created in one weekend at the [Sydney GovHack](http://www.govhack.org/locations/sydney/) hackathon.

```
- Crowdsourced!
- Reliable and Accurate!
- Beautiful!
```

If you're using an Android device, simply open up Google Play and search for _**Time Travelers AU**_.

***

### Information about Time Machine.
Some really crazy and cool information that will stun the viewer so that we can steal their brains.

### Who are the team, and how did you get together?
Joseph made a pitch of his idea to a group of us at GovHack, and we liked his idea so we joined him to create what you can now enjoy without any hard work!

### Authors and Contributors!
```
 (photo goes here)  (photo goes here) (photo goes here) (photo goes here)
Alexander Nicholson  Joseph Hilsburg    Jeremy Vista      Lucas Gerrand
```

***

### Datasets used in our project.
* [State Records](http://www.records.nsw.gov.au/) (private and public, some supplied at GovHack) - 12GB of files and metadata.
* [Trove](http://trove.nla.gov.au/) - Images, events, newspaper articles and metadata.
* [ABS.Stat](http://stat.abs.gov.au/) - Crime data.
* State Library of New South Wales ([via data.gov.au](http://data.gov.au/dataset/photographs-of-sydney-before-1885)) - Photographs of Sydney.

***

### Competition Categories.

NSW/Sydney Prizes:

* Most visibly collaborative team
* Best Example of Social or Environmental Justice
* Best tested submission
* Best Use of NSW Data
* Best hacks that contribute to the research endeavour

Most Innovative Tech Product/Platform

* Best use of government information from State Records NSW

Digital Humanities Themes:

* Best Overall Digital Humanities Hack – can use any of the data from the GovHack 2014 data page
* Best use of Trove data
* Best use of NAA data: History of Agencies and Agency Function from 1901 or historical archive

Social Inclusion Themes: 
* Best overall Social Inclusion Hack – can use any of the data from the GovHack 2014 data page

***

### Contact
If you need to contact our team, we are available at: team@timetravelersau.com
